entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Methods with both stackalloc and loops bypass tiering #85548
  • JIT fails to merge trivial blocks after jump threading #85547
  • Support more date-time formats for JSON deserialization #85545
  • Regression in JsonPlatform due to AVX-512 changes #85543
  • Analyzer/Code fix idea: JsonConverters applied to properties implementing a collection #85540
  • [API Proposal]: add MethodInvoker for fast invoke APIs #85539
    8.0.0
  • Investigate including the SPMI collector as part of the core runtime #85537
  • Microbenchmarks where inliner runs out of budget with TieredPGO #85531
    8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Linux-arm64 llvmfullaot build fails with missing libclang-9.so.1 #85529
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to help keep nullable annotations clean and efficient #85527
  • Analyzer: Recommend upgrading to CompositeFormat for enhanced performance #85525
  • Analyzer: Report use of untestable time-related features #85524
  • JIT: suboptimal codegen for isinst + cast pattern #85522
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console logs an unnecessary Message node in a Scopes node #85514
    Future
  • JIT does not promote Span<T> in R2R code #85511
    8.0.0
  • Missing workloads on Linux #85505

Closed

  • Loop representation, EH, and dominators, on x86 #84222
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Activator API to create a type from a possibly non-public parameterless constructor #85541
  • XUnit log fixer creates invalid XML when fixing the xml after a timed out test #84940
    8.0.0
  • Test failures not reported in test run #85056
    8.0.0
  • createdump is added to Mac app bundles #83613
    8.0.0
  • The JSON value of length n is too large and not supported #2 #39953
    Future
  • Make ParameterBuilder abstract #83831
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.ReceiveMessageFrom_SpanSyncForceNonBlocking.ReceiveSent_UDP_Success test timed out #85535
  • LNK2038 mismatch detected in NativeAOT #85517
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableArray.CreateUnsafe<T>(T[] array) #83141
    8.0.0
  • HelloWorld console app build failed on ppc64le with .NET8 Preview3 #84771
    8.0.0
  • Children of a custom Layout control are not displayed in Design view #85515
  • Force AOT tooling to preserve a generic type to avoid MakeGenericType fails for scripting libraries. #85208
  • cannot build native oat in visual studio code #85325
  • ReversePInvoke transition should be no-op in `DoNotTriggerGc` region on NativeAOT #85377
    8.0.0
  • how can I run runtime tests with monovm on ios? #85160
    8.0.0
  • Transparently serialize collections with custom JsonConverter #85479
  • Various WASM timeouts on CI #85304
    8.0.0
  • [HttpStress] massive timeouts around HTTP/3 stress test startup #77126
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm.Build.Tests] Could not restore Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest #85456
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Make the RefreshMemoryLimit API public #85549
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: one phi arg per pred #85546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `OBJ(LCL_ADDR)` args handling from local morph ref counting #85544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] es6 test main #85542
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup some xarch emit logic #85536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Make optAssertionPropGlobal_RelOp less conservative for side-effects #85532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [browser] Load appSettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` faster encoding for change case. #85516
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Delete `arrayArgumentsFound` logic from type loader #85509
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete more type equivalence logic #85507
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Emission and reading of custom modifiers #85504
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Implements the CodeGen::genCodeForIncSaturate(). #85502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Improve block unrolling, enable AVX-512 #85501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - use the new sdk with templates #85498
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Fix volatility checks in VN and loop side effects code #85467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enhance SSA checker to check some PHI properties #85533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix exception leaking from filter in nativeAOT #85366
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make preinitialized delegates reflection-visible #85506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add documentation for merge on red, build analysis, and v1/v2 tests #84982
    documentation, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Skip methods in test-merging if they use the named argument 'Skip' for the Fact attributes #85495
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128.Create on Arm64 for mini JIT #85404
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Assert on unhandled opcodes instead of falling back to t… #85454
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove redundant dictionary lookup in XPathDocument #85534
    area-System.Xml
  • Remove Base64 value length limit from Utf8JsonWriter #85334
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Abstract out ParameterBuilder and implement it #85446
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6 #85418
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce some collection sizes in the System.Collections.Immutable tests. #85508
    area-System.Collections
  • Add ImmutableCollectionsMarshal type and AsImmutableArray/AsArray APIs #85526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add comparison methods #85512
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Invoke AssemblyLoad hooks from RuntimeAssemblyBuilder:.ctor ()… #85307
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use 8.1 atomics, if available, in RhpCheckedXchg/RhpCheckedLockCmpXchg #85283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Allow reverse pinvoke in DoNotTriggerGc thread state regardless of coop mode. #85435
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: ARR_LENGTH(new T[CNS]) --> CNS #85496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests for local aliasing on Mono Interpreter #85250
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Expanding timeouts for long running test projects #85313
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Comment out support for mtag extension in libunwind #85474
    source-build
  • Disable crossgen on riscv64 #85499
    area-Setup, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add better fix for UnhandledExceptionHandlerUnix #85497
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [wasm] GenerateWasmBootJson - close file handles #85482
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85423
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.7

Updated

  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Prefer lld in NativeAot when using clang #85478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Docs on testing blazor wasm #85455
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][debugger] Support step over and pause multiple times in same line but different columns #85484
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85143
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable regex to use IndexOf(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) for prefix searching #85438
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of IndexOf(chars, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) #85437
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] ArmBase methods are now intrinsic. #85458
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Refactor deduplication to use enum instead of flags #85384
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85341
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • fix JsonNode deserialising from null #85463
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ignore expiration in NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test #83157
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
